Articles.Content:
Sorry if this is not the right forum to ask these types of questions or anything like that.

 

So i have gotten ksp 1.4.5 with sigma dimensions working but i need to get sigma dimensions working on 1.3.1 as well because i have lots of installations and i have lots of mods that are only on 1.3.1.

 

I want to know what is the setup that works without giving moho errors or anything like that. I spent two hours trying to get SD working

SD v0.9.7 (and possibly even v0.9.8)

Kopernicus 1.3.1-5

KSP 1.3.1

 

this setup should work
